Name: Golf Galore
About the game: Golf Galore is an online multiplayer Mini Golf game with crazy mechanics. You can teleport with portals, dodge saw blades, shoot out of cannons, and much more. Currently, Golf Galore features: Online multiplayer 4 maps with 18 holes each: Valley, Haven, Castle, and Lab Golf mode and Race mode Many game options like ball collision, jumping, 'hardcore', random spawns and more Ball customization with Steam items
